alert.note: Alert for Central Plaquemines; Lower Jefferson; Lower Plaquemines; Lower St. Bernard; St. Charles; Upper Jefferson; Upper Lafourche; Upper Plaquemines; Upper St. Bernard; Western Orleans (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 5:11PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...An outflow boundary will impact portions of southwestern St. Bernard, St. Charles, southwestern Orleans, north central Lafourche, northern Jefferson and northwestern Plaquemines Parishes through 545 PM CDT... At 510 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking an outflow boundary along a line extending from near Norco to Chalmette to 8 miles north of Shell Beach. Movement was south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... New Orleans, Chalmette, Avondale, Metairie, Hahnville, Marrero, Harvey, Timberlane, Belle Chasse, Laplace, Jefferson, Gretna, Harahan, Westwego, Jean Lafitte, Montz, Luling, Poydras, River Ridge and Boutte. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 212 and 239. Interstate 310 between mile markers 1 and 11. Interstate 610 between mile markers 1 and 4. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
